template.name: ContinuosHeating
template.label: -26=off, when the outside temperature falls below this threshold temperature the continuous heating function is started (off <=> function is disabled)

template.name: FrostOverRideTime
template.label: delay before frost protection is activated

template.name: AdaptHeatCurve
template.label: automatic correction of configured heat curve

template.name: HwcMaxFlowTempDesired
template.label: maximum flow temperature setpoint of Hwc

template.name: OpModeEffect
template.label: selection which heating circuit is affected by changing parameters in the basic display

template.name: OpMode
template.label: operation mode of all/configured zone(s) matching OpModeEffect

slave.name: MaintenanceDue
slave.label: zeigt an ob die Wartung fällig ist

template.name: HwcTempDesired
template.label: setpoint of domestic hot water circuit

slave.name: Hc1ActualFlowTempDesired
slave.label: current flow temperature setpoint of Hc1

template.name: Hc1ExcessTemp
template.label: excess temperature of Hc1 (flow temperature's setpoint is increased by this value to keep the mixing valve in its control range)

template.name: Hc1AutoOffMode
template.label: operation of Hc1 during the lowering time; no influence if room temperature modulation is set to thermostat

template.name: Hc1MaxFlowTempDesired
template.label: maximum flow temperature setpoint (end emphasis) of Hc1

template.name: Hc1MinFlowTempDesired
template.label: minimum flow temperature setpoint (end emphasis) of Hc1

template.name: Hc1SummerTempLimit
template.label: if outside temperature > summer limit => heating is OFF;applies to comfort and night setback setpoint

slave.name: Hc1HeatCurveAdaption
slave.label: adaption applied to heating curve of Hc1

slave.name: Hc2ActualFlowTempDesired
slave.label: current flow temperature setpoint of Hc2

template.name: Hc2ExcessTemp
template.label: excess temperature of Hc2 (flow temperature's setpoint is increased by this value to keep the mixing valve in its control range)

template.name: Hc2AutoOffMode
template.label: operation of Hc2 during the lowering time; no influence if room temperature modulation is set to thermostat

template.name: Hc2MaxFlowTempDesired
template.label: maximum flow temperature setpoint (end emphasis) of Hc2

template.name: Hc2MinFlowTempDesired
template.label: minimum flow temperature setpoint (end emphasis) of Hc2

template.name: Hc2SummerTempLimit
template.label: if outside temperature > summer limit => heating is OFF;applies to comfort and night setback setpoint

slave.name: Hc2HeatCurveAdaption
slave.label: adaption applied to heating curve of Hc2

template.name: z1HolidayStartPeriod
template.label: start date of holidays for zone 1

template.name: z1HolidayEndPeriod
template.label: end date of holidays for zone 1

template.name: z1BankHolidayStartPeriod
template.label: start date of bank holidays for zone 1

template.name: z1BankHolidayEndPeriod
template.label: end date of bank holidays for zone 1

template.name: z1RoomZoneMapping
template.label: configures which room temperature is assigned to zone 1

template.name: z1ActualRoomTempDesired
template.label: current room setpoint considering all basic conditions passed to the control algorithms

template.name: z2HolidayStartPeriod
template.label: start date of holidays for zone 2

template.name: z2HolidayEndPeriod
template.label: end date of holidays for zone 2

template.name: z2BankHolidayStartPeriod
template.label: start date of bank holidays for zone 2

template.name: z2BankHolidayEndPeriod
template.label: end date of bank holidays for zone 2

template.name: z2RoomZoneMapping
template.label: configures which room temperature is assigned to zone 2

template.name: z2ActualRoomTempDesired
template.label: current room setpoint considering all basic conditions passed to the control algorithms
